service_definition_overrides.Configurations/SVCConfiguration/Definiti: Sample Radiometric Terrain Corrected (RTC) product in VH polarization generated in amplitude scale at 30 meter pixel spacing from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery, processed by ASF.

Sample Radiometric Terrain Corrected (RTC) product in VH polarization generated in amplitude scale at 30 meter pixel spacing from Sentinel-1 SAR imagery, processed by ASF. This product was generated with all optional files included in the product package, for demonstration purposes.
RTC products processed by ASF DAAC HyP3 2023 using GAMMA software. Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data 2022, processed by ESA.
